channel.title: Projects on Jeff Cavanagh
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Jeff Cavanagh

item.title: Minimzing World Electrical Cost
item.description: For my graduate project I created an optimization model that analyzes the cost of electricity world wide and determines how expensive the indirect costs of fossil fuel consumption need to be in order for the installation of renewable electricity sources to be a more financially viable alternative. The write-up of the project can be found here Indirect costs of the various energy sources # Health cost death_source = [2.

item.title: Hiking Trail Analysis
item.description: The following was my final project for a Predictive Analytics course. It analyzed data on hiking trails throughout the US and created and compared models predicting whether or not a given trail will be rated above 4.5 stars out of 5. Setup trails=read.csv("AllTrailsdata_nationalpark.csv",header=T) attach(trails) dim(trails) ## [1] 3313 18 This data set gives information on trails in the National Parks Service. The data is publicly available on Kaggle.com.

item.title: NFL Team Wins Regression Analysis
item.description: This was a final project I completed for my Regression and Time Series Analysis Course. I took data from the 2017 NFL season and used SPSS to determine what metrics were significant in predicting the number of wins a team would achieve. Here is the write up of the project
